title: Software Engineer Web Developer
description: Full time software engineer implementing front and back-end web applications in an existing code base to meet business needs on the Salesforce PaaS.

bullets.point: Primary technologies include Visualforce (HTML dynamic web page framework), Apex (similar to Java)and SOQL (similar to SQL) MVC.
Worked with development managers and stakeholders to plan development sprints and triage bug reports.

title: Student Analyst / Programmer
description: Implemented software applications in multiple programming languages alongside full-time software engineers and graduate faculty.

bullets.point: Contributed to and gained experience leading projects throughout the software development life cycle from requirements gathering to release and maintenance.
Developed OOP applications in Salesforce's PaaS environment using Apex and SOQL with attention to shared tenancy constraints.
Wrote Apex Unit Testing suites to meet the platform's required code coverage in order to deploy each project to production.
Created full stack web applications using JavaScript (ES5/ES6), HTML, CSS on Salesforce.

title: Student Technician
description: Provided technical support to students and faculty of Oregon State University Information Services.

bullets.point: Supported over 35,000 students and a diverse set of faculty, staff and professionals across the university.
Provided customer service over the phone, in person, and via remote desktop connection.
